title: Didn't receive capsule from level up
body: I didn't get a capsule leveling from 36 to 37 and it really feels bad. I noticed in my match history the game where I leveled up shows my grade from the game but no XP associated with it.

replies.body: No worries! Got that added for ya, and if this happens again please reach out to our agents in a ticket so we can get to the bottom of this!

i got the same problem (lvl 39-40) i received the capsule during the amumu game i believe, and as the picture shows, i didnt receive any xp... (i got the notification of the capsule, but didnt actually get it)

https://imgur.com/a/KKwIp
